CLUE: City at the confluence of the Blue and White Nile
FOUND IN: KHARTOUM (again, because it's the most well-known option)
Tiara (a crown or headpiece worn by monarchs, including popes)

Nicosia - The capital and largest city of Cyprus, which is divided into two parts: the internationally recognized government-controlled sector in the south, and the Turkish-occupied sector in the north.
